author: seguidorDeCristo
title: #24 La Religión como un TÍTERE en manos de poderes políticos
text:
Este envío tiene varios votos negativos.
Asegúrateantes de menear La Religión como un TÍTERE en manos de poderes políticos
por a enviado:
Muy necesario mensaje a los creyentes, que estamos siendo utilizados, de nuevo, por políticos que no conocen el Evangelio. No caigamos, otra vez, en las mismas trampas que hemos caído en el pasado. Al César lo que es del César.
|
#6Oraré por ti, para que el único dios verdadero te toque con su apéndice tallarinesco y veas la luz.
No sigo un sistema de creencias
sigo un sistema de EVIDENCIAS
#10en un juicio legal, se aportan EVIDENCIAS y no creencias.
En fin sigue tu camino, yo sigo el mio
#4Un dogma es un conjunto de creencias de carácter indiscutible y obligado para los seguidores de cualquier religión. Eso es incompatible con hacer preguntas.
#17Un argumento a la altura de yo soy el que soy. Una frase que queda muy bien en una taza de Mr Wonderful pero que en realidad no significa nada.
Un buen hilo. Intentare aportar algo.
Yo creo en dios porque tengo trato directo con él. Lo veo en las estrellas, en el horizonte, en la naturaleza, etc.
Tengo estudios universitarios en ciencia y no tengo educación religiosa y nunca he ido a una iglesia. No trago la bilbia, ni el coran, ni el islam, ni a los políticos con sus mandamientos ni a los fanaticos de la ciencia que repiten sin entender lo que dicen.
Mi relación con la creacion divina no sigue dogmas.
Dios ES el universo!
Esto me…

Dios ES el universo!

Punto.
No aportas nada.

author: www.ETGovernment.com
title: MoS Defence assures troops all necessary support and resources for operational readiness, ET Government
text: MoS Defence Sanjay Seth during his visit to NCC Directorate West Bengal & Sikkim at the NCC Institute in Maidan, Kolkata, on Thursday.Minister of State for Defence Sanjay Seth on Thursday visited Fort William, the headquarters of the Eastern Command. By laying a wreath at the Vijay Smarak, Seth paid homage to the brave-hearts who made the ultimate sacrifice in service to the nation.Seth was briefed on the operational and logistical aspects of the Eastern Command and engaged with the troops of Headquarters Eastern Command. He expressed his gratitude and admiration for the dedication and service of Indian Army personnel. The minister lauded all ranks for their unwavering commitment to national security and their relentless efforts in maintaining peace and stability in the region.Emphasizing the critical role played by the Eastern Command in safeguarding the nation's borders and ensuring the safety of its citizens, Seth stated, \"The dedication and professionalism exhibited by all ranks of the Eastern Command are exemplary. Your tireless efforts and sacrifices are a testament to the strength and resilience of our armed forces. The nation is indebted to you for your unwavering vigilance and unflinching courage in the face of adversity.\"Seth also acknowledged the challenges faced by the Eastern Command due to the difficult terrain and weather conditions. He assured the troops that the government is committed to providing the necessary support and resources to ensure their operational readiness and well-being. \"Your service in these demanding conditions is not only a duty but a profound act of patriotism. The nation stands behind you and is proud of your contributions to our collective security,\" he added.Later, Sanjay Seth visited NCC Directorate West Bengal & Sikkim and interacted with officers, instructors, associate NCC officers and cadets of the Directorate at the NCC Institute in Maidan, Kolkata. The RRM was given an immaculate Joint Services Guard of Honour by the smart Army, Air and Naval Wing Cadets of the Directorate. Cadets presented a vibrant cultural program and showcased a wide canvas of their training while interacting with the RRM.In his address, the minister commended the cadets for their selfless commitment to Rashtra Nirman, reflective in various activities undertaken across remote locations by them. He said \"character qualities, values and ethos which they imbibe and spread, epitomise real spirit of unity in diversity that our nation stands for.

author: Olinda Farias
title: Banho para atrair amor e dinheiro: Márcia Sensitiva recomenda
text: A sensitiva Márcia Fernandes, conhecida por fornecer semanalmente o horóscopo à Coluna Pedro Permuy, utilizou suas plataformas nas redes sociais para compartilhar um ritual energético e espiritual destinado à celebração do réveillon. De acordo com a sensitiva, essa prática pode ser adotada especificamente na chegada de 2024, com o propósito de atrair energias positivas, amor, dinheiro e prosperidade. Márcia enfatiza que os banhos energéticos desempenham o papel de purificar, renovar e revitalizar as energias pessoais. Além de fortalecer a proteção espiritual, eles também colaboram na concretização de desejos e metas para o ano vindouro, conforme explicado por ela. Receita do banho do réveillon Quanto à receita, ela inclui 2 litros de água, um punhado de folhas de manjericão roxo, um punhado de folhas de levante e pétalas de rosas brancas. Márcia instrui a macerar as ervas e as pétalas de rosa na água, coar e realizar o banho do pescoço para baixo. Em relação aos restos das ervas, a orientação é descartá-los em lixo comum ou na natureza, como um jardim, por exemplo. Márcia destaca que o momento ideal para realizar o banho é em qualquer horário, durante o dia 31 de dezembro de 2023. Biografia de Márcia Fernandes Márcia Fernandes, renomada sensitiva, conquistou seu espaço no universo esotérico com sua habilidade única de proporcionar orientação e insights. Com uma carreira distinta, Márcia é reconhecida por seus valiosos horóscopos semanais, uma contribuição que solidificou sua reputação como especialista em previsões astrológicas. Nascida com o dom da sensibilidade, Márcia trilhou seu caminho dedicando-se a práticas espirituais e energéticas. Sua presença nas redes sociais tornou-se um farol para aqueles em busca de sabedoria e orientação em momentos cruciais. Márcia não apenas fornece previsões, mas também compartilha rituais e banhos energéticos, destacando-se pela capacidade de traduzir conceitos espirituais complexos em orientações práticas.

author: Chris Shoals
title: Ebbs’ Home Run Launches No. 23 Kentucky to 12-3 Win Over WKU
text:
Ebbs’ Home Run Launches No. 23 Kentucky to 12-3 Win Over WKU
BOWLING GREEN, Ky. – Taylor Ebbs had five runs batted in Wednesday night thanks to a two-run double and a three-run home run in back-to-back innings as the No. 23 Kentucky Softball team scored 12 unanswered runs to beat Western Kentucky 12-3 in five innings at the WKU Softball Complex in Bowling Green.
Stephanie Schoonover pitched 4.2 innings in relief to pick up the win Wednesday night, allowing just one run on the night with a pair of walks and nine strikeouts. She picked up her career-high 17th win on the season to improve to 17-6 this year and only allowed three WKU hits in her outing. Jaden Vickers got the start to the night’s game and struck out one batter.
Kentucky fell behind 3-0 through two innings thanks to a two-run first and a run in the second before the Hilltoppers were held to just three hits by Schoonover the rest of the evening. In the top of the third inning, Taylor Ebbs broke off the seal to the Kentucky offense with a two-run single up the middle, which was followed by a two-run double from Grace Lorsung to give the Wildcats their first lead of the night.
The Wildcats played add-on in the top of the fourth, as two monster home runs put up a five spot on the board. Taylor Ebbs clubbed a three-run shot as she continued her hot hitting from the weekend to push Kentucky’s lead to four, and then Grace Lorsung hit her 13th homer of the season to right field to score herself and Ally Hutchins, who walked earlier in the inning.
With the win, Kentucky is now 27-15 on the season, sitting 12 games over the .500 mark. Western Kentucky, who currently sits atop Conference USA, falls to 25-16-1.
Kentucky will next play at Auburn in the Southeastern Conference’s featured series of the week beginning Saturday afternoon at 4 p.m. ET on SEC Network and concluding Monday night. All three games will air live on SEC Network with Courtney Lyle and Danielle Lawrie on the call from The Plains.
Key Play
Taylor Ebbs’ three-run home run was the key play in the game.
Key Player
The key player in Wednesday night’s game was Hallie Mitchell, who went 1-for-1 at the plate on a bunt single and scored twice. She caught the final three innings of the game.
Key Stat
- Kentucky had 10 hits in the contest.
Run Recap
Western Kentucky used a pair of hits and a pair of walks in the bottom of the first inning off of Kentucky starter Jaden Vickers to take the early lead on a two-spot. WKU 2, UK 0
In the bottom of the second inning, a two-out RBI single put up a third run for the Hilltoppers. WKU 3, UK 0
Kentucky took its first lead in the top of the third inning on a four spot put up by the Wildcats. Taylor Ebbs launched a two-RBI single up the middle to plate a pair and Grace Lorsung pummeled a two-RBI double to score another two runs. UK 4, WKU 3
Two home runs, Taylor Ebbs’ three-run shot and Grace Lorsung’s two-run blast gave Kentucky a five spot in the top of the fourth inning to balloon its lead to five runs. UK 9, WKU 3
Kentucky put up its third-straight crooked number in the fifth inning as Hallie Mitchell led off the inning with a bunt, and scored on a sac fly. Lauryn Borzilleri then scored on a WKU throwing error as did Erin Coffel on a second Hilltopper error in the inning. FINAL – Kentucky 12, Western Kentucky 3
NEW for 2024 – The Kentucky Softball Designated Players Club
The Designated Players is the Official Booster Program of Kentucky Softball. Financial contributions and community support through The Designated Players program, Kentucky Softball will be able to continue to develop our student-athletes on and off the field. To join The Designated Players, you can join
online or click here to download the membership form and mail to the address listed. For more information, email Kristine Himes at or Larry Cash at .
For the latest on UK Softball, follow the Wildcats on Twitter and Instagram at @UKSoftball.

author: Damián Aloi
title: «Es increíble»: Ángel de Brito confirmó el romance que sacude al mundo del espectáculo
text:
Siempre dispuesto a dar todas las primicias del mundo del espectáculo. De esta manera es como se muestra uno de los periodistas de la farándula que han sabido conquistar al público, como es el caso de Ángel de Brito, quien lanzó una verdadera bomba.
Fue en Ángel Responde, su programa de streaming de Bondi, donde confirmó al romance que sacude al mundo del espectáculo. Esto tiene que ver con Sofía Aldrey, la expareja de Fede Bal, y Nacho Vivas, el exnovio de Estefi Berardi, quienes protagonizaron un escándalo en su momento.
“¿Sabés con quién sale Nachito? Sale con la ex de Fede Bal, con Sofía Aldrey. Te persiguen los Bal-Barbieri”, aseveró el comunicador dejando a todos con la boca abierta. «Es increíble cómo se comunica todo. Todos con todos. Es tremendo”, respondió Estefi Berardi.
Cabe recordar que en su momento, Estefi Berardi había anunciado su separación en plena emisión de Poco Correctos. «No estoy más en pareja. No estamos más de novios, pero tenemos un vínculo súper lindo y seguimos en contacto. Decidimos no estar más de novios, pero nunca se sabe las vueltas de la vida», apuntó.
«La mejor, fue todo muy lindo. Estuve casi 6 meses y nunca tuvimos una discusión, nos llevamos increíble. Fue súper hablado. Por ahí, ahora no es momento de comprometerse en una relación, no sé más adelante en qué terminará. Hay mucho afecto y cariño de los dos lados y yo lo quiero seguir teniendo cerca en mi vida», aseveró.
«Es triste, pero tuve un año tan bueno, me pasan tantas cosas lindas, y fue tan lindo lo que disfrutamos juntos que me quedo con eso. La separación fue de mutuo acuerdo. Hoy estuvimos hablando y ayer hablamos un montón»
Fede Bal y Sofía Aldrey

author: MIKE GANGLOFF The Roanoke Times
title: Roanoke County pastor's lawsuit called unfounded
text: A lawsuit accusing a Roanoke County woman of damaging the reputation of a Salem pastor fails to state an actionable claim and improperly seeks to silence political debate, the woman’s attorneys said this week in a response filed in the county’s Circuit Court. Tiffany Sandifer was sued in October by Tom McCracken, who leads the Southern Baptist CommUNITY church. The civil lawsuit, filed amid the uproar about county school policies affecting LGBTQ+ students, said that Sandifer defamed McCracken with social media posts and with a flyer left on vehicles and around the grounds of his church. The lawsuitalso alleges that Sandifer harmed McCracken’s reputation by falsely accusing him of touching her teenage daughter’s shoulder as audience members left a contentious Roanoke County School Board meeting in August. McCracken’s lawsuit also seeks damages from Roanoke City Councilman Luke Priddy, saying that Priddy was at the August county board meeting as well and defamed the pastor by saying that he saw McCracken touch the teenager. People are also reading… The lawsuit, amended in November by McCracken’s attorney, Melvin Williams of Roanoke, now asks for awards totaling $1.95 million from Sandifer and Priddy. It also asks for triple damages and attorney’s fees. The response filed Wednesday by Sandifer’s attorney, Jane Ostdiek of Roanoke, asks for dismissal of McCracken’s lawsuit and for attorney’s fees. Priddy has not yet filed a response. No court date has been set for the lawsuit. McCracken and Sandifer emerged this year on opposite sides of the Roanoke County school policy debate, with Sandifer speaking out against policies that critics called discriminatory and McCracken, a former school board member and briefly a candidate seeking a county supervisor’s seat, rallying congregation members outside school board meetings to support the board’s adoption of the policies. Among the policies were a ban on rainbow flags and similar decorations in schools and adoption of Virginia’s model policy on transgender students, which set stricter requirements for schools to deal with students on the basis of sex assigned at birth. According to McCracken’s lawsuit, Sandifer posted numerous false and defamatory statements about him online, including saying that he had stalked her daughter online and tried to “groom” her to his religious beliefs. The in-person confrontation between Sandifer and McCracken occurred at an Aug. 17 school board meeting where – in an incident not directly related to the lawsuit – an opponent of the board’s policy decisions was arrested for disorderly conduct. McCracken’s lawsuit said that he was at the meeting to support congregation members who were speaking in support of the board during the public comment portion of the meeting, and that Sandifer and her daughter sat hear him. Various comments and gestures were directed toward the pastor during the meeting, the lawsuit alleges. After the meeting, Sandifer’s daughter walked past McCracken, who was still sitting, then turned back toward him and began shouting, the lawsuit alleges. The girl said “he touched me” or “stop touching me,” the lawsuit alleges. Sandifer then told McCracken not to touch her child, McCracken denied that he had, and Sandifer said that he had touched the child’s shoulder, according to the lawsuit. Police officers then separated the group. As they did, Priddy “announced loudly, ‘I saw you touch her,’” according to the lawsuit. Other people began shouting at McCracken and continued as he was escorted to his vehicle by police, according to the lawsuit. It was after this incident that flyers were left on vehicles and in other locations around McCracken’s church, the lawsuit said. The flyers said that the pastor touched and tried to intimidate children and thought their parents would not complicate his life in return, according to the lawsuit. The flyers included a picture of Sandifer’s face, taken from one of her TikTok videos, and after the flyers were left at the church, “at least one family” refused to let their children interact with McCracken, according to the lawsuit. Sandifer’s response to the lawsuit said that McCracken improperly included other people’s online posts and statements at the meeting in his claim against Sandifer. In one example, McCracken’s lawsuit said that he did not know if Sandifer or someone else made some of the comments about him as the crowd left the meeting. Sandifer’s response said that McCracken’s lawsuit is missing other needed specifics about the supposed defamation and the damages it caused. The response noted that several counts of McCracken’s lawsuit allege a conspiracy between Sandifer and Priddy. But no evidence of a conspiracy was presented beyond Priddy’s comment at the meeting and Sandifer later thanking him in an online post, according to the response. And the response argues that McCracken should be seen as a public figure, meaning that in a defamation case, he would need to show actual malice – that even if Sandifer made false statements, she made them knowingly or with a reckless disregard for their truth. Sandifer’s response finished by calling McCracken’s claims of harm “strange and minimal” and tying the lawsuit back to “differences of opinion in religious and political belief.” “Hurt feelings arising from a political debate are inevitable,” Sandifer’s response said. Priddy has not commented on the case. Mike Gangloff (540) 381-1669

author: Clary Castro
title: Emme recupera la sonrisa: paparazzi capta a Jennifer López de compras con su hija en Beverly Hills
text:
Emme recupera la sonrisa: paparazzi capta a Jennifer López de compras con su hija en Beverly Hills
Pese a las criticas que le llueven a Jennifer López, Emme siempre se ha mostrado feliz en compañía de ella y hoy los paparazzi captaron la sonrisa de la joven hija de Marc Anthony
La separación de
Jennifer López y Alex Rodríguez, para muchos, representó un cambio significativo en la vida de Emme. Sobre todo porque una vez se finalizó el compromiso los paparazzi captaron el evidente cambio de look que coincidió con la situación.
La opinión pública prácticamente crucificó a JLo por las decisiones amorosas que ha tomado con el paso de los años, tras su separación con Marc Anthony. Y aunque muchos celebraron que ésta retomara su romance de hace 20 años con Ben Affleck, hubo quienes renegaron aseguran que no se vía bien y tampoco era apropiado que tan poco tiempo después, ésta ya estuviera embarcándose, tanto ella como sus hijos, en una nueva relación de pareja cuando la presencia de A Rod aún estaba muy fresca en la vida de Emme y Max.
Hay que recordar que el ex pelotero de los Yankees tiene dos hijas, Natasha y Elle, quienes durante años fueron amigas y se convirtieron en casi hermanas de los hijos de JLo y Marc.
El rompimiento de este compromiso significó, sin lugar a dudas, un quiebre emocional evidente en los famosos mellizos. Lamentablemente la prensa empezó a exponer la imagen de Emme de manera desconsiderada, buscando en algunos casos la critica hacía Jennifer López y consiguiendo las burlas hacía la menor, tal vez sin querer, tal vez con intención.
El cambio de imagen tan radical por parte de Emme fue lo que más preocupó al mundo del ciberespacio. Previo a la separación de A Rod y JLo, la menor tenía un estilo completamente diferente al que presenta ahora y muchos aseguraron que esta era su forma de exponer lo mucho que le desagradaba lo que estaba pasando a su alrededor.
Ahora, la imagen de Emme no ha cambiado, sigue siendo distinta a la que se apreciaba cuando vivía en compañía de Natasha y Elle, pero los paparazzi han podido captar sonrisas en el rostro de la joven estando en compañía de su madre.
Días antes de Navidad los paparazzi reportaron fotografías para The Grosby Group en donde literalmente se puede apreciar, tal vez, un mejor cambio de actitud en la menor, mientras transitaba de la mano de Jennifer López las elegantes calles de Beverly Hills.
Ahora bien, independientemente de lo que pase en la vida privada de Jennifer López, aún cuando es artista y por lo tanto figura pública, también es cierto que no es justo para ella ni para su familia perseguir a sus hijos, los que al final son menores de edad.
